title: FULL VIDEO ON BOOK AND KEYWORD RESEARCH FOR AMAZON KDP—PART 2
channel: Joshua Barth | KDP Publisher and Creator.
description:
In Part 2 of this Amazon KDP series, we go deeper into advanced book metrics, competition analysis, and final niche validation to help you confidently decide whether a book idea is worth publishing—or should be skipped.

This video builds directly on Part 1 and focuses on filtering, analyzing, and validating your research using real Amazon data.

In this video, you’ll learn how to:

Perform final keyword filtering using real buyer intent

Analyze top competitors in your niche the right way

Use BSR trends to confirm consistent sales activity

Identify overcrowded niches vs. underserved opportunities

Validate profitability before writing, outsourcing, or designing

Make a final GO or NO-GO decision for any book idea

This step is critical if you want to avoid publishing books that never sell and instead focus on high-probability, data-backed niches.
